titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Alexander R. Macey
CWG13758

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 - Expenses to Recruit & Equip Incl. Related Correspondence

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To Alexander Macey, Dr.
186

row.cell: Dir One Copy of Johnsons Family Atlas for use of Insp Genls Office

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; and that the articles were furnished as stated, and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Inspector Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 2d of April 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General for the State of Kentucky fifteen dollars and -- cents, in full of the above account.

127
No. 12.
No. 21 Abstract P
Alexr. Macey
Dollars 1500/100
Paid April 2d. 1864
